metadata.synopsis: The spirit inside the Sentient Amulet, once a monk of Lathander, sees a statue of Lathander in the interior courtyard of the Gith Creche, once a Lathander monastery. Pilgrims of old used to visit the statue to see a holy relic - the Blood of Lathander - though unbeknownst to them, it was a fake prop. The Mad Monk reminisces about his own pilgrimage.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CRE_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe MonkAmulet_Get" and equip the amulet.- Approach the statue of Lathander in the Creche: S_CRE_MonkAmulet_StatueBanter_f83fe070-3bae-4996-a349-7e14f0a0573a"goto 75 9 62"

1.text: Beloved Morninglord. I must request of thee a reverential reverie. HeheHEEEEE!

0.text: I visited this place in a forlorn and forgotten age, to lay mine eyes upon the Blood of Lathander.
